text: Operation Mad Ball is a 1957 American comedy movie directed by Richard Quine and written by Blake Edwards. It stars Jack Lemmon, Ernie Kovacs, Arthur O'Connell, Mickey Rooney, Dick York, Jeanne Manet, William Hickey, L. Q. Jones and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Quine
title: Operation Mad Ball
